string-array.name: holidays_descriptions
string-array.item: Because "Merry Christmas," and, "Hey, let\'s drown green beans in cream-of-mushroom soup!" are basically synonymous.
"Au Gratin" apparently means it\'s sprinkled with cheese. Sprinkled and drenched are practically the same thing, right?
Reality: Would you like some sweet potatoes with your marshmallows?
It\'s drastically different from your everyday Midwestern lasagna, duh.
